channel.title: BBC News - Wales

item.title: Covid PCR tests: Call to investigate cost of travel tests in Wales
item.description: David TC Davies wants people in Wales to be able to access cheaper, private tests like in England.

item.title: Epilepsy patients in west Wales waiting 18 months to see a neurologist, charity says
item.description: Better local treatment and more epilepsy specialist nurses are needed, a charity says.

item.title: From Rhondda to Greenham and the US Supreme Court
item.description: Forty years ago, three sisters began their protest against US nuclear missiles coming to the UK.

item.title: Welsh triathlete suffers 'life-threatening' injuries at event
item.description: Nathan Ford's family say he suffered "life threatening" injuries at the event in Scotland.

item.title: Wrexham: Three murder arrests after man's death
item.description: Detectives are investigating after the man died following a "disturbance" in a north Wales village.

item.title: Snowdon: Llanberis residents kept awake by 24/7 tourists
item.description: Residents complain of early morning celebrations by visitors returning from night climbs.

item.title: Covid-19 hospital numbers show rise by half in a week
item.description: Numbers of Covid patients are still less than a fifth of numbers at this stage in the second wave.

item.title: Covid: Wales probe pressure after Scotland announcement
item.description: Welsh ministers face renewed calls for a Wales-specific inquiry after one for Scotland is announced.

item.title: Vale of Glamorgan councillor abused four children, court hears
item.description: Former teacher Anthony Hampton's actions made one alleged victim "sick to her stomach", a court heard.

item.title: Love Island: Liam Reardon's hometown celebrates win
item.description: Bricklayer Liam Reardon has had a cocktail named after him and he's been offered a free pasty.

item.title: Alex Jones: One Show host has baby daughter
item.description: The BBC presenter already has two sons and now she has given birth to her first daughter.

item.title: Covid: Calls to investigate cost of travel tests in Wales
item.description: Tory MP David TC Davies says people in Wales should be able to shop around for a PCR test supplier.

item.title: Levelling up: Lessons from Rhyl on the changes needed
item.description: The BBC asks locals in the town of Rhyl how the government's levelling up agenda could help them.

item.title: Snowdon hectic with 24/7 tourists, say Llanberis residents
item.description: Residents say walkers have been trudging up and down to the peak around the clock.

item.title: Love Island: Liam Reardon's hometown raises a pint after win with partner Millie
item.description: "It's hard not to see them grow in popularity," one TV critic said of Liam and partner Millie.

item.title: Tokyo Paralympics: Baroness Grey-Thompson tips Welsh duo for gold
item.description: Baroness Tanni Grey-Thompson tips Aled Sion Davies and Hollie Arnold as Wales' best hopes for gold at the Tokyo Paralympics.

item.title: Porthcawl RNLI surfer rescue in storm captured on camera
item.description: The footage of the rescue shows an 18-year-old US surfer pulled clear of a rip current.

item.title: Wales' World Cup qualifier with Belarus in Russia a 'nightmare', says Robert Page
item.description: Manager Robert Page says Wales face a "logistical nightmare" in playing their World Cup qualifier with Belarus in Russia.

item.title: Swansea City 4-1 Plymouth Argyle: Morgan Whittaker hat-trick helps Swans to EFL Cup win
item.description: Morgan Whittaker scores a hat-trick as Swansea City beat League One Plymouth Argyle to reach the third round of the EFL Cup.

item.title: Cardiff City 0-2 Brighton & Hove Albion: Seagulls into Carabao Cup third round
item.description: Brighton maintain their impressive start to the season to advance in the Carabao Cup and inflict Cardiff's first loss of the campaign.

item.title: Aaron Ramsey: Juventus say Wales midfielder has thigh injury
item.description: Juventus midfielder Aaron Ramsey is a Wales injury worry in the build-up to their World Cup qualifiers in September.

item.title: Tokyo Paralympics: 2020 Games get under way with powerful opening ceremony
item.description: The Tokyo 2020 Paralympics are officially under way after a powerful opening ceremony.

item.title: Galw am ymchwilio i gost profion er mwyn teithio o Gymru
item.description: Mae Dirprwy Weinidog Swyddfa Cymru yn cyhuddo Llywodraeth Cymru o "wneud bywyd yn anodd" i deithwyr.

item.title: Diffyg triniaeth epilepsi yng ngorllewin Cymru
item.description: Yn ôl un elusen, mae pobl epileptig yn yr ardal angen aros hyd at 18 mis ar gyfer apwyntiad.

item.title: Ymchwiliad Covid yr Alban yn rhoi pwysau ar Gymru
item.description: Mae galwadau newydd am ymchwiliad Covid yn benodol i Gymru yn dilyn cyhoeddiad yr Alban y bydd un yna.

item.title: Gemau Paralympaidd 2021: Dod i adnabod y Cymry
item.description: Dyma'r Cymry fydd yn cystadlu yn Tokyo

item.title: Cwpan yr EFL: Abertawe 4-1 Plymouth Argyle
item.description: Morgan Whittaker yn sgorio hat-tric wrth i'r Elyrch hedfan trwodd i drydedd rownd Cwpan yr EFL.
